satlas.combinedmodel.CombinedModel.seperate_response¶

CombinedModel.seperate_response(x)[source]¶

Generates the response for each subspectrum.

Parameters:x (list of arrays) – A list equal in length to the number of submodels, contains arrays for which the submodels have to be evaluated.
Returns:evaluated – The output array, of the same shape as the input list of arrays, containing the response values.
Return type:ndarray

satlas.combinedmodel.CombinedModel.plot_spectroscopic
